p: This strategy is also applicable to coronaviruses, which encode a 3CL pro responsible for viral polyprotein cleavage. Porcine epidemic diarrhea virus (PEDV), an Î± coronavirus, is one of the major threats to the swine industry worldwide. The development of antiviral drugs targeting 3CL pro is an important strategy to prevent PEDV epidemics. The global outbreak of SARS in 2003 accelerated study on anti-coronavirus inhibitor development, and many researchers have been committed to developing broad-spectrum antiviral inhibitors against coronavirus 3CL pro.
